scope_of_work: The Kenai Peninsula Borough School District (KPBSD) is seeking a comprehensive cybersecurity assessment to: ✔ Evaluate its current cybersecurity posture, ✔ Develop an improvement plan, and ✔ Provide technical recommendations tailored to a public-sector K-12 school district. Indrasol's cybersecurity assessment will align with NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF), NIST 800-171, and industry best practices to ensure a structured, risk-based approach.
proposal_infrastructure: KPBSD operates 42 schools with approximately 8,400 students and 1,200 staff. The district maintains a wide area network (WAN) connecting schools across southcentral Alaska, ensuring access to digital resources essential for education. While KPBSD and the Kenai Peninsula Borough (KPB) are separate government entities, they have a long-standing, tightly integrated IT relationship. KPB owns the majority of the buildings and internal cable plant that KPBSD operates within. KPBSD's core IT infrastructure is housed in the Soldotna data center, a facility shared with KPB. KPBSD and KPB operate separate networks but share a single demarcated connection in the Soldotna data center for specific shared resources. This cybersecurity assessment will be solely focused on KPBSD, with KPB's operations only considered where they impact KPBSD's network security (e.g., network interconnects and shared resources).

scope_of_work: Assess KPBSD's existing security measures, including:
Device-level security for routers, switches, wireless infrastructure, cameras, printers.
OS-level security, including local security policies, group policies, and patch management.
Network security, including firewall configurations, content filtering, and access controls.
Core infrastructure security, including Active Directory, VOIP PBX, and file servers.
Application security for Line of Business (LoB) applications such as HR, Finance, and Student Records.
Disaster Recovery (DR) & Continuity of Operations (COOP) planning and effectiveness.
User training and processes to prevent phishing, social engineering, and cybersecurity threats.
assessments.deliverables: Confidential Cybersecurity Assessment Report identifying deficiencies, risks, and mitigation strategies.

scope_of_work: Identify deficiencies in existing IT policies and procedures.
Determine missing policies and gaps in the security governance framework.
Provide sample policies to strengthen KPBSD's cybersecurity posture.
assessments.deliverables: Policy & Governance Assessment Report with recommended policy improvements.

scope_of_work: Develop a prioritized roadmap for security improvements.
Provide technical and operational recommendations for risk mitigation.
Ensure recommendations align with KPBSD's operational scale and available resources.
Identify resource deficiencies and provide actionable resolution options.
assessments.deliverables: Prioritized Cybersecurity Improvement Plan for risk mitigation and enhanced security resilience.

scope_of_work: Other vendor-recommended assessment tasks to enhance security posture.
assessments.deliverables: Optional Penetration Testing Report (if included), detailing attack vectors and mitigation strategies.

deliverables.title: 2. Prioritized Cyber Security Improvement Plan
deliverables.description: A structured roadmap with actionable recommendations to improve KPBSD's cybersecurity resilience and risk mitigation strategies.

deliverables.title: 3. Executive Summary Report

service_costs.description: Comprehensive assessment of KPBSD's network, endpoint security, firewalls, Active Directory, VoIP PBX, and cloud infrastructure. Includes security configuration reviews and vulnerability analysis.
Review of existing IT security policies, procedures, and compliance frameworks (NIST CSF, NIST 800-171, CMMC). Identify gaps, recommend policy updates, and provide governance best practices.
Development of customized cybersecurity training materials for KPBSD staff and students. Includes anti-phishing simulations, security workshops, and user awareness training.
Development of Incident Response Playbooks, Security Incident Management Plans, and Disaster Recovery (DR) Frameworks. Focus on rapid detection, containment, and mitigation of cyber threats.
Deployment of threat intelligence techniques, dark web monitoring, advanced analytics, and proactive cyber threat identification to strengthen KPBSD's security posture.
Strategic consulting to ensure KPBSD aligns with federal and state cybersecurity mandates. Includes recommendations for security configuration improvements and access control enhancements.

service_costs.component: Final Cybersecurity Assessment Report & Strategic Roadmap
service_costs.description: Delivery of comprehensive security assessment findings, risk prioritization, mitigation strategies, and a long-term cybersecurity improvement plan. Includes CISO-level executive summary for leadership review.
